name: Geeks vs Gangsters
description:
Welcome to Geeks vs Gangsters, a strangely addicting incremental masterpiece, a clicker game to outplay them all! Are you ready to idle for serious bucks?

Side with one of the two factions and join the everlasting race for money, idle game style! Participate in monthly seasons for a chance at winning lots of money worth in GG-Bucks!

Join the Geeks and earn your money the – almost – legal way or side with the gangsters, ranking up bucks on the dark side!

No matter which faction you choose, if you want an idle game to relax, this one is for you.

We have:

• Two unique factions
• A talent system unique amongst clicker games
• Different Manager types
• Online Saves
• Lots of stuff to upgrade

But wait, there is more!

• No forced ads or push notifications
• Offline playable
• Customizable background music
• Leaderboards
• Free daily bucks to increase your revenue

Now what are you waiting for? Start your idle experience right now and become the incredibly rich person you've always wanted to be!

If you have trouble getting into our awesome idle game, give us a shout! We might have a few bucks spare to upgrade for any valuable ideas you've got.

Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U7L6KAc26Ww
